name: Rise of the Machines (VampireFE)
description:
Game was made for DK30 Fall 2022 GameJam.

A puzzle game where you need to 'program' a robot so it can complete its goal: clean up the "dirt" and then reach an "upgrade". Game contains 10 playable levels.

(Levels can be skipped with CTRL+] and CTRL+[ keys)
